title: Is ‘QAnon Shaman’ Jake Angeli Turning His Back on Trump?
subtitle: Wearing horns and furs on his head, Jake Angeli was a highly visible figure in the U.S. Capitol insurrection.
author: Jessica Lee
vclaim: QAnon proponent Jake Angeli, who faces criminal charges related to the U.S. Capitol insurrection, was willing to testify against President Donald Trump in his second impeachment trial set to begin in early 2021.
